name: react-router-query-to-props
description: React higher-order component which provide location query as props to target component
author: Vladimir Zhukov

scripts.build-to-tabix: npm run clean && tsc --project ./tsconfig.json --outDir '../tabixio/tabix/node_modules/react-router-query-to-props/dist/' && copyfiles package.json '../tabixio/tabix/node_modules/react-router-query-to-props/'
scripts.build-to-project-langlearn: npm run clean && tsc --project ./tsconfig.json --outDir '../project-langlearn/node_modules/react-router-query-to-props/dist/' && copyfiles package.json '../project-langlearn/node_modules/react-router-query-to-props/'
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.patch-publish: npm version patch && npm publish --access public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor-publish: npm version minor && npm publish --access public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major-publish: npm version major && npm publish --access public && git push --follow-tags
